attributes.action: Repeal the recent amendment in Law and stop NHS Staff from being sacked
attributes.additional_details:
the vaccines do not stop transmission of the virus and the Covid 19 yellow card system. https://coronavirus-yellowcard.mhra.gov.uk/ has highlighted many adverse reactions to the vaccine which are not reported to the general public.
Unvaccinated staff have continued to work for the NHS during the current winter pressure months. These NHS staff do not suddenly become contagious in April 2022 and a threat to others. The vaccines do not stop anyone spreading the virus.
attributes.background: The government should recognise the the current vaccination programme does not stop anyone vaccinated or unvaccinated spreading the Covid virus(es). Therefore the mass sacking of unvaccinated NHS staff must be stopped. their decision is also supported by The Human Rights act and informed consent.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598996
